data.message:
and i'll continue to report spam until facebook is completely spam-free!

FACEBOOK, if you're reading, your new group option where friends automatically join in groups when added is probably a hole for spammers (not only that, you guys default the new group activities sent to my email too!)  

I love the new "Group" app, but I am extremely concerned about spamming!  Please review the usability of the app!
